container-title: MIDI ’13 Proceedings of the International Conference on Multimedia, Interaction, Design and Innovation, New York. Notes on Contributors Maria Elena Alva Industrial Engineer (Industrial Engineering School
note: Master Information System (UPAO-Peru & I.T.S.M-Mexico, 1988), PhD (Oviedo University, Spain, 2005). Professor for Programming Languages at the Engineering Faculty of the U.P.A.O University in Peru (1990 – 2005). Currently, she is Professor for Programming Languages and Computer Systems at the Oviedo University. Her research interests include web usability and accessibility, web engineering, natural interaction and augmented reality.
